# launchOptions

**Instance Property**

Options that customize a document-based app’s launch view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var launchOptions: UIDocumentViewController.LaunchOptions { get set }
```

## Customizing the launch experience

- **UIDocumentViewController.LaunchOptions**: Options for customizing the document launch view.
